name: Inevitable - Prototype+Demo
description:
When the only ones left on the planet are you and zombies, it is "Inevitable"

This was a project from around 2010-2012 when I was learning coding and basic game development. I recently found all my old projects and decided to share them with everyone. I have come a long way since these projects, and even now I continue to work hard on learning more about game design. Creating games is my dream and my passion.

I may return to development on "Inevitable" at some point, but for now "Project XH" is my main focus, a 3D arenaFPS game inspired by Quake 3, Descent 2, and Half-Life 2. Learn more at: www.patreon.com/grimsikk
